en.title: Middleware 2
en.subtitle: Complete Wwise audio implementation for game level with spatial audio, dynamic mixing, and Game Syncs integration.

overview.title: Real-World Audio Implementation
overview.text: Exam assignment that mirrors real production. I got a working game build with Menu and First Level. Events and parameters already implemented. My task: implement all audio to finish the gameplay experience using Wwise best practices.

obj1.title: Clean Project Structure
obj1.item1: Follow best practices for Wwise project structure

obj2.title: Technical Implementation
obj2.item2: Setup correct spatialization for in-world sounds
obj2.item4: Apply reverb using provided Game Syncs

obj3.title: Audio Design Quality
obj3.item2: Ensure correctness and loop sounds where needed
obj3.item3: Avoid sync issues and cut-off sounds

feat1.title: Spatial Audio
feat1.desc: 3D audio with distance falloff and positioning. Sounds come from where they should in the game world.

feat2.title: Dynamic Mix
feat2.desc: Mix adapts to gameplay. Important sounds stay clear, background stuff stays in the background.

feat3.title: Game Syncs Integration
feat3.desc: Reverb changes with location. Audio parameters react to game state. Everything responds to what's happening.

technical.title: Wwise Implementation
technical.text: Event management, Game Sync integration, 3D positioning, mix optimization. Memory and CPU best practices. Cohesive sound that hits real-time performance standards.

nl.title: Middleware 2
nl.subtitle: Volledige Wwise-audio-implementatie voor gamelevel met ruimtelijke audio, dynamische mixing en Game Syncs-integratie.

overview.title: Real-world audio-implementatie
overview.text: Examenopdracht die echte productie weerspiegelt. Kreeg een werkende gamebuild met menu en eerste level. Events en parameters al geÃ¯mplementeerd. Mijn taak: alle audio implementeren om de gameplay-ervaring af te maken met Wwise best practices.

obj2.title: Technische implementatie
obj2.item2: Stel correcte spatialisatie in voor in-world geluiden
obj2.item4: Pas reverb toe met behulp van geleverde Game Syncs

obj3.title: Audiokwaliteit
obj3.item2: Zorg voor correctheid en loop geluiden waar nodig

feat1.title: Ruimtelijke audio
feat1.desc: 3D-audio met distance falloff en positionering. Geluiden komen van waar ze horen in de gamewereld.

feat2.title: Dynamische mix
feat2.desc: Mix past zich aan aan de gameplay. Belangrijke geluiden blijven helder, achtergrond blijft op de achtergrond.

feat3.title: Game Syncs-integratie
feat3.desc: Reverb verandert met locatie. Audioparameters reageren op gamestatus. Alles reageert op wat er gebeurt.

technical.title: Wwise-implementatie
technical.text: Eventbeheer, Game Sync-integratie, 3D-positionering, mixoptimalisatie. Best practices voor geheugen en CPU. Samenhangend geluid dat realtime-standaarden haalt.
